rows.label: tlk4530005803_msg0001
rows.name:
Doctor Smaia suddenly declared she's
leaving the clinic to me, then went
rushing off without another word.

rows.label: tlk4530005803_msg0002
rows.name:
I mean, I'm sure I can handle things
on my own. I've watched the Doctor
at work for many years.

rows.label: tlk4530005803_msg0003
rows.name:
But a lot of our regular patients
are saying they're going to miss
Doctor Smaia's brusque attitude.

rows.label: tlk4530005803_msg0004
rows.name:
Perhaps I should mimic her way
of talking? Do you think?
